title.en: A Prayer to the Omniscient Jigme Lingpa

text.en: Oṃ ho ye! Lord, sovereign of the hundred families and protector of beings,
text.en-trans: om ho yé, je rikgyé khyabdak drowé gön

text.en: Father, Jigme Lingpa, remembering you my suffering is relieved.
text.en-trans: pa drenpé dung sel jikme ling

text.en: Hearing your name, conditioned existence is torn right through.
text.en-trans: tsen töpé sipa hrulpor jé

text.en: Lord, great liberator upon hearing, to you I pray!
text.en-trans: jé tödrol chenpor solwa deb

text.en: You were prophesied by glorious Padmasambhava
text.en-trans: pal pema sambhé lungten ching

text.en: And had visions of the joyful Lord Drimé Özer,
text.en-trans: jé drimé özer gyé zhal jal

text.en: Who entrusted you with the teachings of the three piṭakas and Great Perfection.
text.en-trans: chö désum dzogchen tenpa té

text.en: Protector Rangjung Dorje,1to you I pray!
text.en-trans: gön rangjung dorjér solwa deb

text.en: Your mind is immaculate, primordial wisdom of insight and love.
text.en-trans: tuk khyentsé yeshe drima mé

text.en: Your speech is the all-pervading Dharma song.
text.en-trans: sung chö kyi drayang yong la khyab

text.en: Your body shines with the major and minor marks, so wondrous.
text.en-trans: ku ngotsar tsenpé nyinmor jé

text.en: Father, Khyentse Özer, to you I pray!
text.en-trans: pa khyentsé özer solwa deb

text.en: By practising the yogas of the path’s two stages,
text.en-trans: lam rimnyi naljor jepa yi

text.en: The knots of your channels, vital essences, and wind-energies were naturally freed,
text.en-trans: tsa tik lung düpa rangdrol bé

text.en: Enabling you to master, without study, all knowable things.
text.en-trans: khyö ma lab sheja tadak khyen

text.en: Lord, Guru Mañjughoṣa, to you I pray!2
text.en-trans: jé jamyang lamar solwa deb

text.en: Your mind of bodhicitta is rich with Dharma.
text.en-trans: chö changchub sem kyi tukgyü jor

text.en: You love all beings like your very own child
text.en-trans: khyö drowa kün la bu tar tsé

text.en: And provide for them, all mother-like beings.
text.en-trans: ma semchen kün gyi nyer tsö zhi

text.en: Protector Avalokiteśvara, to you I pray!
text.en-trans: gön chenrezik la solwa deb

text.en: Father, with your incomparable strength
text.en-trans: pa khyé kyi tutob da mepé

text.en: You vanquish the cities of demonic rākṣasas.
text.en-trans: dü sinpö drongkhyer mong né zhom

text.en: Deity who is victorious over all,
text.en-trans: chok kün lé nampar gyalwé lha

text.en: Protector Vajrapāṇi, to you I pray!
text.en-trans: gön lak na dorjér solwa deb

text.en: Source of refuge who embodies all the three roots, Lord Guru,
text.en-trans: kyab tsa sum kündü guru jé

text.en: The secret storehouse of your wisdom mind overflows with treasures.
text.en-trans: tuk gongpé sangdzö terchen dol

text.en: Lord, you have arrived at the summit of the path of the four visions.
text.en-trans: jé nang zhi lam gyi tsemor sön

text.en: Father, primordial protector, to you I pray!
text.en-trans: pa dömé gönpor solwa deb

text.en: Protector, Lotus-Born Drimé Özer,
text.en-trans: gön pejung drimé özer gyi

text.en: The instructions of your wisdom treasures pervade the whole world.
text.en-trans: tuk ter gyi dampé dzamling khyab

text.en: Lord whose activity makes every connection meaningful—
text.en-trans: jé dreltsé dönden trinlé chen

text.en: Glorious Pema Wangchen, to you I pray!
text.en-trans: pal pema wangchen solwa deb

text.en: I, your son, from now until awakening,
text.en-trans: bu dak gi lo nying drang sumpo

text.en: With my mind, my heart and soul,3
text.en-trans: dü deng né changchub nyingpö bar

text.en: Rely on you and surrender to you entirely,
text.en-trans: pa kyab kündü zhal chenpo la

text.en: Father—you are the very face and embodiment of all sources of refuge.
text.en-trans: ré tö ling kyur gyi bul lak na

text.en: Lord Guru, look upon me with your wisdom eye,
text.en-trans: jé lamé yeshe chen gyi zik

text.en: And do not let your hand of compassion forsake me.
text.en-trans: dak tukjé chak gi ma dor ang

text.en: Whatever suffering or happiness befalls me, your son,
text.en-trans: bu dak la kyiduk chi jung yang

text.en: Father, supreme object of remembrance, you know me.
text.en-trans: pa dren chok lama khyerang khyen

text.en: In the casket of the expanse of five lights within my heart
text.en-trans: dak nyingkha ö ngé long drom du

text.en: Abides the father, the naturally arisen, indestructible three kāyas.
text.en-trans: pa ku sum rangjung dorjé zhuk

text.en: Having perfected the great dynamic energy of awareness and emptiness,
text.en-trans: bu riktong gongpé tsal chen dzok

text.en: May I become indivisible from the wisdom mind of the protector Samantabhadra!
text.en-trans: gön kunzang tuk dang yermé shok
